metadata.name: Warhammer 40K NPC Generator
metadata.author: Rolldeo
metadata.description: A comprehensive NPC generator for Warhammer 40,000 themed tabletop roleplaying games. Generates Imperial citizens from various world types with appropriate names, personalities, backgrounds, and descriptions suitable for any W40K RPG system.
metadata.instructions: Use the `npcComplete` template for a full NPC description with all properties exposed. Use `npcBrief` for a shorter summary. Individual tables can be rolled separately for specific details.

copyright.notice: This generator creates original content inspired by the Warhammer 40,000 setting. Warhammer 40,000 is a trademark of Games Workshop Ltd.

rights.compatibilityNotice: This is fan-made content for use with Warhammer 40,000 themed tabletop RPGs. Not affiliated with Games Workshop.

tables.name: Hive World Male Names
tables.description: First names for male hive worlders - gritty, industrial, often shortened or harsh-sounding.

tables.name: Hive World Female Names
tables.description: First names for female hive worlders - tough, pragmatic names suited to industrial life.

tables.name: Hive World Surnames
tables.description: Surnames for hive worlders - often related to industry, location, or family trade.

tables.name: Forge World Male Names
tables.description: First names for male forge worlders - often classical or technical sounding.

tables.name: Forge World Female Names
tables.description: First names for female forge worlders - classical and technical influences.

tables.name: Forge World Designations
tables.description: Technical designations used as surnames or identifiers on forge worlds.

tables.name: Noble House Male Names
tables.description: First names for male Imperial nobility - High Gothic, pompous, elaborate.

tables.name: Noble House Female Names
tables.description: First names for female Imperial nobility - High Gothic, elegant, imperious.

tables.name: Noble House Surnames
tables.description: House names and surnames for Imperial nobility.

tables.name: Feral World Male Names
tables.description: First names for male feral worlders - harsh, tribal, primal.

tables.name: Feral World Female Names
tables.description: First names for female feral worlders - fierce, primal, warrior names.

tables.name: Feral World Tribal Names
tables.description: Tribal or clan surnames for feral worlders.

tables.name: Shrine World Male Names
tables.description: First names for male shrine worlders - saintly, religious, devotional.

tables.name: Shrine World Female Names
tables.description: First names for female shrine worlders - saintly, religious, devotional.

tables.name: Shrine World Surnames
tables.description: Surnames for shrine worlders - often saint-names or religious references.

tables.name: Voidborn Male Names
tables.description: First names for male voidborn - ethereal, ship-related, void-touched.

tables.name: Voidborn Female Names
tables.description: First names for female voidborn - ethereal, ship-related, void-touched.

tables.name: Voidborn Ship Names
tables.description: Ship lineage surnames for voidborn - derived from their family's ship.

entries.value: of the Sword of the Emperor

tables.name: Gender
tables.description: Gender identity for NPCs.

tables.name: Human Origin/Homeworld Type
tables.description: The type of world the NPC originates from, which influences their name, culture, and outlook.

entries.description: Born in a massive hive city, a towering mega-structure of industry and squalor.

sets.typicalClothing: worn industrial garb or worker's coveralls

entries.description: Raised on a planet dedicated to manufacturing, often with Mechanicus influence.

sets.culturalBackground: the sacred forges of the Omnissiah
sets.typicalClothing: red-tinted robes or technical garments with mechadendrite housings

entries.description: Born into Imperial nobility, raised in luxury and political intrigue.

sets.culturalBackground: the gilded halls of Imperial nobility
sets.typicalClothing: elaborate finery with house colors and crests

entries.description: Raised on a primitive, often dangerous world with minimal Imperial development.
Born on a world dedicated to the Imperial Cult, steeped in religious devotion.

sets.culturalBackground: a world of cathedrals and endless devotion
sets.typicalClothing: devotional robes or pilgrim's garb bearing holy symbols

entries.description: Born and raised aboard a void ship, never knowing solid ground.

sets.culturalBackground: the cramped corridors of a void ship

entries.value: instinctively seeks high ground in unfamiliar spaces
hoards food and small valuables obsessively
habitually checks exits and escape routes
has difficulty with concepts of personal space
automatically assesses strangers as threats or assets
is uncomfortable in silence; expects constant background noise
speaks in technical jargon and numerical designations
touches and examines machinery with reverence
unconsciously performs maintenance rituals on nearby devices
prefers the company of machines to people
becomes agitated when technology is misused
speaks prayers to machines before using them
measures everything in precise numerical values
expects to be served and attended to
references family lineage frequently in conversation
shows subtle disdain for those of lower station
obsesses over matters of honor and reputation
is uncomfortable with physical labor or manual tasks
maintains elaborate grooming and appearance rituals
instinctively plays political games in all social situations
finds technology confusing or spiritually suspect
resolves disputes through shows of strength
interprets Imperial faith through animistic traditions
trusts instincts and omens over rational analysis
marks significant events with ritual scarification
is always armed, even in supposedly safe situations
speaks in simple, direct terms; finds subtlety dishonest
shows tremendous endurance for physical hardship
peppers speech with prayers and religious invocations
carries multiple devotional items and relics
views all events through the lens of divine providence
recoils from perceived blasphemy or heresy
fasts or mortifies the flesh regularly
speaks of the Emperor as a living, personal presence
prostrates before any significant Imperial iconography
finds gravity disorienting after years in void
always knows ship orientation and direction instinctively
has unsettling, pale features from void-exposure
speaks in naval terminology and shipboard slang
becomes anxious when unable to hear the hum of engines
has prophetic dreams or strange premonitions
is superstitious about warp travel rituals
feels exposed and vulnerable under open skies

tables.name: NPC Age
tables.description: Approximate age bracket of the NPC.

tables.name: Physical Build
tables.description: Body type and physical stature.

sets.buildDescription: thin and underfed, bones visible beneath the skin
lean and sinewy, with a deceptive strength
powerfully muscled from physical labor or training
heavily overweight, a sign of unusual wealth or indulgence
body heavily modified with mechanical augmetics

tables.name: Eye Color
tables.description: Eye color, including augmetic options.

sets.eyeDescription: unsettling black eyes with no visible iris
twin augmetic eyes that whir and focus independently

tables.name: Hair Description
tables.description: Hair style, color, and condition.

sets.hairDescription: head shaved close to the scalp
hair shaved in a devotional tonsure

tables.name: Skin Tone
tables.description: Skin color and condition.

tables.name: Distinguishing Feature
tables.description: A notable physical characteristic that makes this NPC memorable.

entries.value: an aquila tattoo on the neck
a servo-skull that follows them constantly
a purity seal affixed to their clothing
prayer beads wrapped around one wrist
electoo circuitry visible on the skin
a voicebox augmetic that gives their voice a mechanical quality
an ornate bionic eye with telescoping lens
hands calloused from decades of labor
a holy symbol branded into the forehead

tables.name: Clothing Style
tables.description: General style and condition of clothing worn.

entries.value: ragged, patched clothing barely holding together
practical worker's garb stained with labor
carapace armor or flak vest over civilian clothes
red Mechanicus robes with visible augmetics

tables.name: Primary Personality Trait
tables.description: The most dominant personality characteristic.

sets.primaryDescription: approaches problems with cold, practical logic
burns with fervent devotion to their beliefs
sees the worst in people and situations
constantly schemes for advancement and power
devoted unwaveringly to their masters or cause
takes pleasure in the suffering of others
shows unexpected compassion in a merciless galaxy
driven by an insatiable desire for wealth
accepts that death is inevitable and near
sees omens and portents in everything
consumed by resentment over past injustices
maintains hope despite the grim reality

tables.name: Secondary Personality Trait
tables.description: A supporting personality characteristic.

sets.secondaryDescription: has trouble focusing on one thing
copes with horror through grim jokes
maintains rigid formality in all interactions

tables.name: Behavioral Quirk
tables.description: A distinctive behavioral habit or mannerism.

entries.value: constantly touches a holy symbol when nervous
mutters prayers under their breath habitually
picks at old scars when thinking
collects small tokens from significant events
refuses to sit with their back to a door
stares into the middle distance when stressed
speaks in the third person occasionally
whispers important information even in private

tables.name: Primary Motivation
tables.description: What drives this NPC's actions.

sets.motivationDescription: simply wants to live another day
will do anything for their loved ones
burns to avenge a past wrong
runs from something in their history
seeks to atone for terrible deeds
works to spread the Emperor's word
lives to kill the Emperor's foes

tables.name: Greatest Fear
tables.description: What this NPC fears most.

sets.fearDescription: haunted by the terrors of the immaterium
lives in terror of the ordos
constantly checks themselves for signs of deviation
dreads the corrupting touch of the Ruinous Powers
panics in darkness, needs light always
feels vulnerable without walls around them
fears corruption of the machine spirit
paralyzed by fear of not succeeding

tables.name: Level of Imperial Faith
tables.description: Devotion to the God-Emperor and the Imperial Cult.

sets.faithDescription: harbors dangerous doubts about the Imperial faith
follows religious observances out of habit and social pressure
holds sincere faith in the God-Emperor
burns with fervent devotion to the Emperor
would die gladly for the Emperor without hesitation
conceals beliefs that would be considered heretical

tables.name: Dark Secret
tables.description: A hidden truth about this NPC that could destroy them if revealed.

sets.secretDescription: seems to have no major skeletons in their closet
conceals a minor mutation beneath their clothing
committed serious crimes in their past
owes money to people who will kill to collect
saw heretical acts and failed to report them
took a life outside sanctioned violence
secretly owns something that would mean their death
had contact with chaos and hides the taint
carries non-human blood in their lineage
once belonged to a heretical cult

entries.value: addicted to obscura or other substances

sets.secretDescription: living under an assumed name and history
has untrained psychic potential they fear

entries.value: knows damning information about a powerful figure

sets.secretDescription: possesses information that could destroy the powerful

tables.name: Social Class
tables.description: Position in Imperial society's rigid hierarchy.

sets.classDescription: the lowest of the low, barely surviving
a cog in the vast Imperial bureaucracy
minor landowners and the petty wealthy

tables.name: Relationship Status
tables.description: Personal romantic/family situation.

sets.relationshipDescription: has never formed a lasting bond
in a formal partnership recognized by Imperial authorities
lost their partner, likely to violence or disease
foregoes romance for duty or faith
actively looking for a suitable partner
involved in a complex family or political arrangement

tables.name: Imperial Standing
tables.description: Reputation with Imperial authorities.

sets.standingDescription: authorities have their eye on this person
a proper Imperial citizen with documentation
known to have allies in high places
holds some form of Imperial sanction

tables.name: Profession/Occupation
tables.description: The NPC's primary occupation or role in Imperial society.

sets.professionDescription: serves aboard a rogue trader vessel

tables.name: Personal Item of Significance
tables.description: A meaningful possession they carry or treasure.

entries.value: a locket containing a pict of a loved one
a spent bolt casing from a historic battle
a saint's finger bone in a reliquary
a hand-written letter they never sent
a knife passed down through generations
a faded playing card from a lucky hand
an ancient chrono that no longer keeps time
a flask of blessed water from a shrine world
a servo-skull of a deceased mentor
a set of marked playing cards
a vial of soil from their homeworld
a key to a lock they've never found

tables.name: Carried Weapon
tables.description: What weapon (if any) the NPC carries openly or concealed.

entries.value: a work tool that doubles as a weapon

sets.weaponDescription: their tools could easily become weapons
carries a blade of some quality
is clearly hiding something beneath their clothes

tables.name: Story Hook
tables.description: A potential plot hook or reason for interaction with this NPC.

entries.value: knows something about a recent disappearance
is being followed and doesn't know why
has a map to a rumored treasure
witnessed a crime by someone powerful
is looking for hired help for a dangerous job
owes a debt they can't repay
seeks revenge against someone the party knows
can provide access to a restricted area
has a bounty on their head
is searching for a specific person
knows the location of a hidden cache
carries a message they cannot read

tables.name: Initial Attitude
tables.description: How the NPC initially reacts to strangers.

tables.name: Voice Description
tables.description: How the NPC sounds when speaking.

entries.value: a raspy voice damaged by smog or smoke

templates.name: NPC Full Name
templates.description: Generates a full name appropriate to the NPC's origin and gender.

templates.name: Physical Appearance
templates.description: Generates a physical description of the NPC.
templates.pattern: A **{{$age}}** individual, {{$age.@ageDescription}}. They are **{{$build}}**, {{$build.@buildDescription}}. They have {{$skin.@skinDescription}}, {{$hair.@hairDescription}}, and {{$eyes.@eyeDescription}}. Their most distinguishing feature is {{$feature}}. They wear {{$clothing}} and speak with {{$voice}}.

templates.name: Personality Profile
templates.description: Generates the NPC's personality traits and psychological profile.
templates.pattern:
This person is **{{$primary}}**  {{$primary.@primaryDescription}}. They are also {{$secondary.@secondaryTrait}}, meaning they {{$secondary.@secondaryDescription}}. They {{$quirk.@quirk}}.

**Motivation:** {{$motivation.@motivationDescription}}.
**Greatest Fear:** {{$fear.@fearDescription}}.
**Faith:** {{$faith.@faithDescription}}.

templates.name: Background Summary
templates.description: Generates the NPC's social background and position.
templates.pattern:
**Social Class:** {{$class.@classDescription}}.
**Profession:** As a {{$profession.@profession}}, they {{$profession.@professionDescription}}.
**Relationships:** {{$relationship.@relationshipDescription}}.
**Imperial Standing:** {{$standing.@standingDescription}}.
**Dark Secret:** {{$secret.@secretDescription}}.

*Potential Hook:* {{$hook}}.

templates.name: Complete NPC Profile
templates.description: Generates a full NPC with all characteristics, suitable for immediate use. All properties are available for reference by other tables.

templates.name: Brief NPC Description
templates.description: A shorter NPC summary suitable for quick reference.

templates.name: NPC Quick Stats Block
templates.description: Generates just the essential stats for an NPC in a compact format.

templates.name: Random Encounter NPC
templates.description: Generates a quick NPC suitable for a random encounter.

templates.name: NPC Group Member
templates.description: Generates a brief NPC description suitable for group/crowd members.
